mapper.select: SELECT M.ID, M.NAME, M.EMAIL, M.PHONE, S.COMPANY, S.STATUS FROM SELLER S LEFT JOIN MEMBER_ROLE MR ON S.ID=MR.ID INNER JOIN MEMBER M ON MR.ID=M.ID WHERE S.STATUS=0 AND MR.ROLENUM=4
